actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend section 10 of the Tobacco Inspection Act for the purpose of making it unlawful for a tobacco company to be represented at an auction sale of flue-cured or burley tobacco by more than one buyer.

summary.text: Makes it unlawful, under applicable provisions of the Tobacco Inspection Act, for a tobacco company to be represented at an auction sale of flue-cured or burley tobacco by more than one buyer.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 10 of the Tobacco Inspection Act for the purpose of making it unlawful for a tobacco company to be represented at an auction sale of flue-cured or burley tobacco by more than one buyer.
